name: send_tips
attributes: # [doc = " 2. チップ送信：指定回数分の lamports を vault から recipient へ移動  "]
# [doc = "    オーバーフローや残高不足はすべて `unwrap()` によるパニックで扱う"]
body: let vault_info = ctx . accounts . vault . to_account_info () ;
let recipient_info = ctx . accounts . recipient . to_account_info () ;
let total = cfg . lamports_per_tip . checked_mul (count) . unwrap () ;
